/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The buildings lining the street are made of concrete and painted in shades of beige and brown, adding a touch of urban charm. Power lines crisscross above, connecting the buildings and hinting at the city's infrastructure. People can be seen walking on the sidewalks, going about their day, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The image is a snapshot of everyday life in Beijing, encapsulating the city's vibrant energy and architectural style.
